item.title: Javascript Study Notes
item.description: JavaScript, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS. As of 2022, 98% of websites use JavaScript on the client side for webpage behavior, often incorporating third-party libraries. In this post, I will make some notes about my further study about JavaScript.
